cgMDR:administered_item_administration_r.cgMDR:administrative_note: Import of Minimum Cancer Data Set

cgMDR:containing.cgMDR:name: CONSULTANT CODE
cgMDR:containing.cgMDR:definition_text: This is the GENERAL MEDICAL COUNCIL (GMC) CODE for the CONSULTANT. For GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS (GPs) working as CONSULTANTS, the GP's GENERAL MEDICAL COUNCIL (GMC) CODE should be used, see data item note for GMP (CODE OF REGISTERED OR REFERRING GMP). For NHS patients treated overseas, the commissioner of the overseas treatment is responsible for ensuring that the overseas doctor is provided with a GENERAL MEDICAL COUNCIL (GMC) CODE. In the case of overseas doctors the default code C9999998 should only be used where no GENERAL MEDICAL COUNCIL (GMC) CODE has been assigned.All Midwife Episodes and attendances are identified in the Commissioning Data Sets (CDS) and Hospital Episode Statistics (HES) by a pseudo MAIN SPECIALTY CODE, 560, see Main Specialty And Treatment Function Codes. A default code is used in the CONSULTANT CODE field to show that a MIDWIFE is the responsible professional. Note that the midwife's own code is not used.All Nursing Episodes and attendances are identified in the CDSs and HES by a pseudo MAIN SPECIALTY CODE, 950, see Main Specialty And Treatment Function Codes. A default code is used in the CONSULTANT CODE field to show that a NURSE is the responsible professional. Note that the nurse's own Nursing and Midwifery Council code is not used.Midwife Episode is an ACTIVITY GROUP where the ACTIVITY GROUP TYPE is National Code 24 'Midwife Episode'.Nursing Episode is an ACTIVITY GROUP where the ACTIVITY GROUP TYPE is National Code 26 'Nursing Episode'.
